title: Jack of Hearts Taric!?
body:
With the new card deck themed skins coming out, there is 1 piece missing from a 'meta' comp, and that's the support.

Currently tentative for release are the Ace of Spades Ezreal, Wild Card Shaco, King of Clubs Mordekaiser, and Queen of Diamonds Syndra.  

What's left? Why support of course. And the last card appropriate enough for the set would be of course, the jack. So since a jack card would require a Male character as well as a support, why not make it for Taric?  

I've heard through the interweb grapevine that Taric is getting an update soon...  

Taric always goes well with Ezreal... 

Thresh and Braum just got skins....

Please make this happen! I am not a visual artist so no concept art, sorry! Plus I would hope that this skin would come out after his rework anyway. 

Anyone feeling this idea?

Edit: I'm an idiot and did not know that there was already a Jack of Hearts Twisted Fate. Oh well.

replies.body:
> Edit: I'm an idiot and did not know that there was already a Jack of Hearts Twisted Fate. Oh well.

Definitely not an idiot. :] It's an older skin, and you're not the only one wondering where the Hearts falls into place.

In regards to Taric, RiotRepertior mentioned in [this thread](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/EABt8X1q-riotrepertoir-how-is-taric-and-the-rest-coming-along?comment=0000) that he's currently in the middle of a rework. 

Since he's going to be receiving a new model, animations, etc., we decided to hold off on giving Taric a new skin until after his rework is complete.

Queen of Diamonds Taric... should have happened.  He's all about gems anyway.
{{champion:44}}
I think it would be more appropriate if it was king of diamonds
